title: Lemon and honey spatchcock chicken with quinoa and broad bean salad
description: This is the perfect dish for dinning al fresco this summer with its combination exotic flavours of preserved lemon, chillies, green olives and herbs.
ingredients: 3 green chillies, seeds removed, roughly chopped
2-3 tbsp Gordal or Queen green olives, pitted and cut into segments
salt and freshly ground black pepper
